directions: Cook potatoes in pot of boiling salted water until tender, about 20 minutes. Drain. Return potatoes to pot; mash. Mix in butter, syrup and cardamom. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 2 1/4 pounds red-skinned sweet potatoes (yams), peeled, cut into 1-inch pieces
title: Mashed Sweet Potatoes with Maple Syrup
